name: run
description:
Run automatic direct message to new members

*Requires confirmation by reaction:*

name: stop
description: Stop automatic direct message to new members

name: change
description:
Change the message

*Requires confirmation by reaction:* 
Argument
`{content}` : Your content message

name: show
description: Displays messages to be sent to new members

name: setbot
description:
change bot status, this will reset bot activity

Argument
`{status}` : `online`, `offline`, `idle`, `dnd`, `invisible`

name: activity
description:
change bot activity. 

Argument:
`{type}` : `playing`, `listening`, `watching`, `unknown`
`{name}` : Activity name

name: reply
description:
Send and hold user with {user id} for reply DM channel

*This command only can be use on DM channel by owner*
Argument :
`{user id}` : Discord user id

name: exit reply
description:
Exit from `reply` command

 this command only can be use on DM channel by owner

name: say
description:
Send message to specific channel

Argument :
`{channel}` : channel mention
`{message}` : Your message
